title: yAtakke durAshi
sahitya:
yAtakke durAshi ele manave


anupallavi

  ele manave nI tiLi manave ninagyAtakke durAshi


caraNam 1    janma janmAntarada pUje balavu anubhavisallade biDadelo manave
    caraNam 2    phaNeyalli bareda brahmaNa lipiya mIruvudunTe jagadoLu manave
    caraNam 3    purandara viTTalana caraNa kamalagaLa anudina bhajisi badukelo manave
